member.name: IDCompositionTableTransferEffect.SetAlphaDisable
member.summary: Specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the Alpha channel.
member.param: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the alpha channel. If you set this to TRUE the effect does not apply the transfer function to the Alpha channel. If you set this to FALSE it applies the AlphaTableTransfer function to the Alpha channel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionTableTransferEffect.SetAlphaTable
member.summary: Sets the list of values used to define the transfer function for the alpha channel.
member.param: The list of values used to define the transfer function for the alpha channel.
The number of values in the tableValues parameter.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionTableTransferEffect.SetAlphaTableValue
member.summary: Sets a value in the alpha table.
member.param: The index of the value to set.
The new value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionTableTransferEffect.SetAlphaTableValue
member.summary: Sets a value in the alpha table.
member.param: Index of the value to change.
An animation that represents how the value in the alpha table changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionTableTransferEffect.SetBlueDisable

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

The new value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionTableTransferEffect.SetBlueTableValue
member.summary: Sets a value in the blue table.
member.param: The index of the value to set.
An animation that represents how the value changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionTableTransferEffect.SetClampOutput
member.summary: Specifies whether the effect clamps color values to between 0 and 1 before the effect passes the values to the next effect in the graph.
member.param: A boolean value that specifies whether the effect clamps color values to between 0 and 1 before the effect passes the values to the next effect in the graph. If you set this to TRUE the effect will clamp the values. If you set this to FALSE, the effect will not clamp the color values, but other effects and the output surface may clamp the values if they are not of high enough precision. The effect clamps the values before it premultiplies the alpha.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.param: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the green channel. If you set this to TRUE the effect does not apply the transfer function to the green channel. If you set this to FALSE it applies the GreenTableTransfer function to the green channel.

member.name: IDCompositionTableTransferEffect
member.summary: The table transfer effect is used to map the color intensities of an image using a transfer function created from interpolating a list of values you provide.
